sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Award, Star, Trophy } from "lucide-react"; function Rewards({ studyStats, currentTheme }) { const isDarkMode = currentTheme === "Dark Mode"; const isOceanBreeze = currentTheme === "Ocean Breeze"; const isLightMode = currentTheme === "Light Mode"; const isSunsetGlow = currentTheme === "Sunset Glow"; const isForestWhisper = currentTheme === "Forest Whisper"; // Define achievements const achievements = [ { id: 1, title: "Early Bird", description: "Study for 5 hours before noon", icon: , achieved: studyStats.totalHours >= 5, // Simplified condition }, { id: 2, title: "Streak Master", description: "Maintain a study streak of 7 days", icon: , achieved: studyStats.streak >= 7, }, { id: 3, title: "Marathon Runner", description: "Study for 50 hours in total", icon: , achieved: studyStats.totalHours >= 50, }, ]; return (

Achievements

{achievements.map((achievement) => (
{achievement.icon}

{achievement.title}

{achievement.description}

))}
); } export default Rewards;
